operator.title: Encrypt File (Password)
operator.synopsis: This operator uploads the input file to the Amazon S3 cloud storage.

text.paragraph: This operator uploads the input file to the selected Amazon S3 cloud storage.
To upload to a specific folder, add foldername/ before the actual filename, e.g. 'mainfolder/filename.xlsx'.
Make sure that the correct bucket is set, otherwise an error will occur!

inputPorts.port: The file object which should be uploaded to Amazon S3 cloud storage.

outputPorts.port: The input file object is passed through and returned here.

parameters.parameter: The connection details for the Amazon S3 connection have to be specified here. This includes the access key, secret key and the region.
The name of the Amazon S3 bucket into which to upload the file.
The name of the file when it is uploaded. To upload to a specific folder, add foldername/ before the actual filename, e.g. 'mainfolder/filename.xlsx'.
Optional mine type of the file, e.g. 'text/xml'.
